decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan, Site Block Plan, Existing Ground Floor Plan 1169/01, Existing First Floor Plan and Front Elevation 1169/02, Existing Rear Elevation 1169/03, Proposed Side Elevation 1169/04, Proposed Ground Floor Plan 1169/05 B, Proposed First Floor Plan and Front Elevation 1169/06 B, Proposed Second Floor Plan 1169/07 B, Proposed Elevations 1169/08 D, Proposed Side Elevation 1169/09 D.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the hereby approved extensions.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey rear/side wraparound extension; rear roof extension, extending over rear outrigger, incorporating a Juliet Balcony; installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
